item.title: Utilize Soundslice's JS API to make our Custom Player UI control Soundslice Iframe Embed
item.description: https://app.fiddlequest.com - React. Typescript, business logic-rich, media rich, reactive/realtime, html5 game app, ios/android video shoot/upload app. Infrastructure: AWS for synchronisation with the html game app and the teacher mobile app; maintenance tasks, emailing, video converting, file storage, backup storage. Stripe for non-trivial billing setup (coupons, discounts, subscription grades). DigitalOcean for hosting the apps. Docker, Ansible for building it. Backend: Meteor, Node.js with Typescript, custom Meteor protocol for data exchange with frontend.
